attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: the WORST app ever. do not recommend. this app will slow your phone down incredibly and uses way to much data. not to mention it barely works, someone really need to figure this app out or delete it. all it does is load at “trump 2020” for 10 minutes. incredibly horrendous for someone who’s supposed to “make america great again” how is he supposed to do that when he can’t even make an app great? disappointed to say the least.

attributes.title: This App Is Demonic!
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE and needs to be taken off the AppStore immediately!! I downloaded the app to see if the President would be improving his policies and when I opened the app a bunch of Russian soldiers kicked down my door! They began to all speak in tongues and my family will be attending an exorcism later this week to purify ourselves after downloading this app. This is a truly terrible app and it has also spread COVID-19 to my entire city due to this app. Please Apple get rid of this horrible app!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: my phone was completely fine i mean nothing wrong with it. i just got my phone about a week ago and i go to download this app to keep up with our excellent president and my phone started having major glitches. and it also wouldn't let me open the app store. and not only that but it says i have no storage when i have 256gb. im just so upset that i can't get the updates😔. and if i could give below one star im sad to say i would.

attributes.title: Stanky merch!!!
attributes.review: My pet lizard accidentally got onto my phone and ordered trump merch and when doing so he ordered 30 shirts!!!! I was extremely confused so I tried contacting the customer service and when I wanted to cancel my order they ACTUALLY and I quote responded with “no, u may not cancel your order. We can tell that u need new clothes because ur ugly and look like a rat!” Then hung up the phone. When the merch came in it REAKED of fish and poopoo. It was STANKY STANKY!!! MY WHOLE HOUSE SMELLED LIKE FISH AND FECIES DUE TO TRUMPS MERCHANDISE! This much get taken off the App Store IMMEDIATELY.

attributes.title: Terrifying and should have a Trigger Warning
attributes.review: I saw this app and was interested to see what the features were. Since Mr. Trump is our president obviously I expected the best app. Once I downloaded it I was greeted with this disgusting photo of a stale and old Cheeto. I was mortified. I was not informed that this would pop up. I immediately began to have headaches and stomach pain from the atrocious sight. The pain got so worse the I began to vomit. To anyone who would like to download this app please be warned that it is utterly disgusting.

attributes.title: This is disgusting
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support trump but as son I open his NUDES!!!! He should go to jail for this because It is not okay!!! It made me want to die and to never see with my eyes again!!!! This and then it said it was sending to police to my house but I NEVER gave it permission to track my location!!!! This app is a violation of privacy and should be banned for its crude and exploitation of its customer. So now the only thing I can say about this is any one who downloads it is a 🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: Cheetoh man was stalking me after i download this app
attributes.review: Please help cheetoh man won’t stop looking at me while I was taking a dump in my sink in my sleep so I took off my pants and showed him my pyrokenisis sixth finger ball so I just went to sleep playing my Ninatenoo Swisch In the morning I saw him still outside so I called my father that I adopted off eBay but he was still getting milk from Mars so I called my mom who is also my grandmother and she said delete the trump app and then everything was fine from there

attributes.title: why bother?
attributes.review: this is quite possibly the worst app I have used in my entire life. DO NOT USE YALL. First off, the app launches the user into a game which is rigged against them. The “bad guy” is this orange who attempts to take over the world by creating conflict and making it a white mans world. Secondly, I got kicked off because I am a woman and part of the LGBTQIA+ community which means I automatically lose. And finally, in the end, I easily hacked the game(GO GEN Z) and took over making everybody equal and put the orange in jail:))

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: ok hold up i didn’t get a chance to even open the app because of the volume in this bus it was ✨𝑎𝑠𝑡𝑟𝑜𝑛𝑜𝑚𝑖𝑐𝑎𝑙✨ i was looking at some bald headed cheeto and i wasn’t warned i thought this was an ad for the cheeto company anywayz my balls are sweaty 😱 moms spaghetti  😼ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 chile anyways- i don’t like this vibe that it’s giving me 🤧 my cat started barking at my donkey and my poor donkey got scared and stood up on his 2 legs and stop kicked my cat 😰 based on a true story

attributes.title: This app is a danger to society
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I saw the most horrific creature I’ve EVER SEEN IN MY LIFE! It was like bird box, immediately wanted to die/go insane. After witnessing the app I’ve gotten ptsd flash backs, nausea/vomiting, clinical depression, craving for Chito‘s, and yellow hair! I’ve been on multiple medication and different types of therapy since I’ve witness the app. My health has gone down hill. I don’t have that much longer to live 😔 in conclusion this app is a danger to society, emotionally scaring, and NEEDS to be TAKEN DOWN.
